t:
“This is the only thing that can save your planet from drastic climate change”,
the alien told me, holding a shimmering crystal in its hand.

Before it could utter another word, rounds of bullets fired by the military put a hole in its head shattering the crystal.
c:
“You're safe now”, the military said to me. They've no idea.

We're not safe. With the alien, the world is dead too.



#climate #alien #scifi #military #cruel #kill #climatechange #deadworld
